text: Cassandra Peterson (born September 17, 1951) is an American actress. She played Elvira in Elvira, Mistress of the Dark. She also played the Hostess in the movie Elvira's Movie Macabre. Peterson was born in Manhattan, Kansas. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Kansas Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Cassandra Peterson
